titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to exempt from inspection certain small passenger vessels that operate in waters of the United States only in the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/31/2001--Introduced. Amends Federal shipping law to exempt from Federal inspection requirements small passenger vessels that carry no more than 12 passengers and operate only in U.S. Virgin Islands waters.
